rm{
    Version{"2.1.28.76"}
    durationUnits{
        hm{"h:mm"}
        hms{"h:mm:ss"}
        ms{"m:ss"}
    }
    units{
        duration{
            day{
                one{"{0} di"}
                other{"{0} dis"}
            }
            hour{
                one{"{0} ura"}
                other{"{0} uras"}
            }
            minute{
                one{"{0} minuta"}
                other{"{0} minutas"}
            }
            month{
                one{"{0} mais"}
                other{"{0} mais"}
            }
            second{
                one{"{0} secunda"}
                other{"{0} secundas"}
            }
            week{
                one{"{0} emna"}
                other{"{0} emnas"}
            }
            year{
                one{"{0} onn"}
                other{"{0} onns"}
            }
        }
    }
    unitsNarrow{
        duration{
            day{
                one{"{0} dis"}
                other{"{0} dis"}
            }
            hour{
                one{"{0} uras"}
                other{"{0} uras"}
            }
            minute{
                one{"{0} mins."}
                other{"{0} mins."}
            }
            month{
                one{"{0} mais"}
                other{"{0} mais"}
            }
            second{
                one{"{0} secs."}
                other{"{0} secs."}
            }
            week{
                one{"{0} emnas"}
                other{"{0} emnas"}
            }
            year{
                one{"{0} onns"}
                other{"{0} onns"}
            }
        }
    }
    unitsShort{
        duration{
            day{
                one{"{0} di"}
                other{"{0} dis"}
            }
            hour{
                one{"{0} ura"}
                other{"{0} uras"}
            }
            minute{
                one{"{0} min."}
                other{"{0} mins."}
            }
            month{
                one{"{0} mais"}
                other{"{0} mais"}
            }
            second{
                one{"{0} sec."}
                other{"{0} secs."}
            }
            week{
                one{"{0} emna"}
                other{"{0} emnas"}
            }
            year{
                one{"{0} onn"}
                other{"{0} onns"}
            }
        }
    }
}
